GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.10.161
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: uvc: Prevent buffer overflow in setup handler

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.161 by commit c79538f32df12887f110dcd6b9c825b482905f24, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit cdda479f15cd13fa50a913ca85129c0437cc7b91. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: gadget: uvc: Prevent buffer overflow in setup handler
